post.author: 김성욱
post.content:
One of my connections in the US let me know they are looking for a Korean-speaking developer urgently.
What I know of it is, - Working location: Dallas, Texas - Client: Samsung (Electronics?) - Initial term: 6 months (possible extension) - Status: Canadian only (will be under W2) - Start date: ASAP - Skills: Java, JSP, etc. (web dev)
Please email me if you're interested.
brendan.kim@gmail.com
post.title: Dallas, TX - Sr Java (web) developer, 6mth, Citizen only
